description.@en: You have successfully unraveled the confusion of the Ætheric Winds, able to ‘separate’ them as you call forth Magick. These strands are then re-woven into perfect, silvery order; their warp and weft woven together to achieve spectacularly perfect feats of Magick.

effect.@en: Select one Petty, one Lesser and one Greater Magick spell over the course of your Profession. When you succeed at your Incantation Test to cast these spells, treat them as Critical Successes instead.
